subject: Skiing
Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2010)
Television
Paralysis
lead_paragraph: Sandra Laoura, who won bronze in the moguls of the Winter Games of Turin and later lost the use of her legs in an accident, is a commenter for French television.
snippet: Sandra Laoura, who won bronze in the moguls of the Winter Games of Turin and later lost the use of her legs in an accident, is a commenter for French television.
